description: Primes p such that p + 2^p is also a prime.
comments: Different from A056206, where, e.g., at n=89, 89 is not minimal, A056206(89)=29 and not 89.a(6) > 27479. - _Ralf Stephan_, Oct 23 2002
prog: (PARI) \ p^q + q is prime q is prime ptoqpq2(p,n)= { local(x,y,q); for(x=1,n, q=prime(x); y=p^q+q; if(ispseudoprime(y),print1(q",")) ) } \\ _Cino Hilliard_(MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(1000) | IsPrime(2^p+p) ] // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 07 2010
author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 16 2000
